snippet: BAER--Theodore, 87, passed away peacefully April 26th in Southold, NY. Loyal and caring husband for 65 years to his beloved soulmate, his heart, his everything, the late Bertina Baer. In each other's arms again, with extraordinary grace and beauty...
lead_paragraph: BAER--Theodore, 87, passed away peacefully April 26th in Southold, NY. Loyal and caring husband for 65 years to his beloved soulmate, his heart, his everything, the late Bertina Baer. In each other's arms again, with extraordinary grace and beauty, they dance together to songs that now only they can hear. "Teddy Baer" as he was affectionately known, served a distinguished clientele for over 50 years as a jeweler where he was esteemed for his integrity, generosity and skill. His handsome elegant attire, heart-warming smile and many kindnesses will live long in the memories of those who knew him. He is survived by sons Andrew and Nolan, daughter-in-law Colleen Griffin, cousin Alan Baer, nephews Jeffrey and Barry Neichen, and half-siblings Arlene and Arthur Isaacs. Memorial service to be held in Manhattan at a future date. For information please call (212) 397-4822.
